ValidationRule.description: A referrer must be added before conversion if lead source requires
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IsConverted && ISBLANK(Referrer__c) && (ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Introducer") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Employee Referral") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Client Referral") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Acquisition") || ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Financial Wellbeing Rollout"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must add a referrer before converting. Please add using the manage lead source button.
